hero.mainCopy: The Textbook of Korea's Immigration Control Act, Sejoong Law Firm Sets the Standard.
hero.subCopy: Led by Managing Partner Lee Sang-guk, Ph.D., who combines theory and practice, along with experts in each field, we provide clear solutions from the most complex immigration administration to challenging civil and criminal disputes.

authority.title: 01. The Authority
authority.description: Led by Managing Partner Lee Sang-guk, Ph.D., author of 《Immigration Control Act》, we are the mecca of administrative and immigration litigation.

triNetwork.title: 02. Tri-Network
triNetwork.description: With a strategic three-point network of Seoul Headquarters (Control Tower), Uijeongbu (Real Estate & Family), and Ansan (Foreigners & Labor), we provide region-specific solutions.

globalStandard.title: 03. Global Standard
globalStandard.description: We realize one-stop legal services from communication beyond language barriers to global corporate advisory and visa procedures.

leader.title: Managing Partner
leader.ceoMessage: Law must serve people. Especially at borders, this is even more true.
leader.message: As a scholar and practitioner who has researched immigration control law and foreign policy for decades, I promise you this. From unjust forced deportation, difficult visa issues, to complex property disputes of our neighbors. Sejoong Law Firm will be your strongest shield protecting your rights.
leader.name: Managing Partner / Ph.D. in Law Lee Sang-guk
